mapper.insert: INSERT INTO QnA ( seq,userId, qnaTitle, qnaContent , qnaContent_photo, qnaContentdate) VALUES( QnA_seq.nextval,#{userId}, #{qnaTitle}, #{qnaContent}, #{qnaContent_photo}, sysdate)
mapper.select: select seq as qnaSeq, userid as userId, qnatitle as qnaTitle, qnaContent as qnaContent, qnaContent_photo as qnaContent_photo, qnaContentdate as qnaContentdate, qnaComment as qnaComment from QnA ORDER BY seq DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Ball ( ballseq,userId, ballTitle, ballContent , ballContent_photo, ballContentdate) VALUES( Ball_seq.nextval,#{userId}, #{ballTitle}, #{ballContent}, #{ballContent_photo}, sysdate)
mapper.select: select * from Ball ORDER BY ballseq DESC
